NAME: Rakesh Singh
ABOUT:
For exciting work opportunities at Aditya Birla Group and Aditya Birla Capital, visit https://careers.adityabirla.com.

24 years of leadership and corporate board experience across SME finance, Housing finance, Commercial finance, Digital financial products, Wealth management, Capital Market offerings & Broad based lending. With strong emphasis on growth, cross disciplinary teams of Sales, Operations, Risk assessment, Compliance, Digital and Business intelligence.

I joined Aditya Birla Finance Limited as CEO in July 2011 and in short span of time transformed the company into one of the leading NBFC in India. Spearheaded a very well diversified NBFC cutting across Retail, MSME, SME, Mid Corporate & Structured finance solution verticals within Aditya Birla Financial Services group. I am passionate about helping MSMEs & SMEs have easy access to capital via customized financing solutions such as Loans, Supply Chain Financing and more. In recent times, a significant area of my work has been expanding the distribution channel of SME lending beyond physical mediums to digital platform.

With my previous experience of 16 years with Standard Chartered Bank holding a number of roles, including Value Centre General Manager and Head – SME Banking business India & South Asia, and Value Centre General Manager and Head – Mortgages business, India.

Actively involved with a number of industry forums including CII, Assocham and FICCI. I lend my expertise as a member of FICCI’s Banking & Financial Institutions Committee, as an honorary member on the Advisory Board of London Education Management Consultants & on the Board of Studies as member for Narsee Monjee Institute of Management Studies.
